title: I don't understand the mmr system (2 plats in a low level game)
body:
Dunno if this is the right board to post it in, but:
so my friend was in a game where there were 2 platinum players on his team, when the rest of the team was below level 30. Op.gg: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=kesh48bang

Thoughts?
